articles.title: Kim Jong Un Looks Round Construction Site of Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Site of Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, went round the construction site of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum now under construction by service personnel.
					 He was greeted on the spot by commanding officers of the KPA unit involved in the construction.
					
					 He visited the museum in July last year and  initiated the reconstruction  of this edifice, which is of important significance in carrying forward the fighting spirit displayed by the former generation, as required by the Songun era. He chose its site and instructed the KPA to undertake the project.
					
					 He was informed in detail of the progress made in the construction by commanding officers of the unit.
					
					 Watching the gatepost of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower under construction, he underscored the need to construct it well. 
					
					 Examining the design for greening the education ground, he said that it would look nice when completed.
					
					 He praised the soldier-builders for the work done by them, noting that they removed frozen earth and pavement of thousands of square meters under hard conditions in winter and completed the project for creating a turf area in a short span of time.
					
					 He underscored the need to arrange environment such as planting trees in good season and properly establish irrigation and drainage systems.
					
					 Seeing the design for the out-door weaponry exhibition, he set forth tasks to be fulfilled to construct the new exhibition.
					
					 Commanding a bird's eye-view of the construction site, he repeatedly expressed satisfaction. He said the museum is located in a very good place and its design is done well.
					
					 Watching the statue "Victory", the main theme of the tower for a long while, he said the longer one watches it, the more splendid it looks and asked about the creator of the statue.
					
					 After learning about the production of stone needed for construction and stonework, Kim Jong Un specified ways for doing it well.
					
					 While looking round the construction site of a dock which will host the U.S. imperialist spy ship "Pueblo" captured by the navy of the Korean People's Army after intruding the territorial waters of the DPRK, he clarified issues arising in its construction.
					
					 He went round the main building of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.
					
					 In the main lobby that will host the statue of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, he examined the design for the main building and appreciated its good design.
					
					 Looking round the hall on the second floor and a round exhibition hall, he underlined the need to build them well in line with the appearance and nature of the museum.
					
					 He said the museum serves as a base for anti-U.S. education as it equips service personnel, working people and youth and students with the Juche idea, the anti-imperialist revolutionary idea, outstanding commanding art, and military strategic tactics and war methods of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He called for winding up the construction of the museum before the 60th anniversary of the victorious Fatherland Liberation War so as to glorify for all ages the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung for the victory of the war and the spirit of devotedly safeguarding the leader and defending the country displayed by the army and people in the 1950s.
					
					 He was accompanied by Vice-Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the KPA General Political Bureau.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Tactical Exercise for Attack
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Tactical Exercise for Attack
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), guided a tactical exercise for attack combined with living shell firing by a sub-unit under KPA large combined unit 526.
					 He was greeted on the spot by commanding officers of the large combined unit.
					
					 He mounted the observation deck to be briefed on the exercise program by its commanding officer.
					
					 He issued an order to start the exercise.
					
					 When a signal flares up, various types of artillery pieces opened fire all at once with the bugle sound.
					
					 Signals flared up from all trenches of the "enemy" on mountain ridges after they were occupied at a breath and hurrahs were heard from soldiers.
					
					 He highly appreciated the successful exercise.
					
					 He said the exercise proved that the KPA is raising a hot wind of training after ideologically accepting the spirit of the recent meeting of the Central Military Commission of the WPK.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be carried out to get the KPA ready for combat as required by the prevailing situation.
					
					 He noted that it is necessary to continue directing big efforts to strengthening the KPA in order to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, Songun revolutionary cause started in the forest of Mt. Paektu generation after generation.
					
					 He called for preparing all service personnel as stalwart fighters possessed of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's strategy and tactics, bold offensive methods and perfect capability to fight an actual war.
					
					 It is important for defeating the enemies to steadily round off the study of the Korean style combat methods suited to a modern war and promptly wipe them out, not giving them a breathing spell, once a war breaks out, he said.
					
					 He underlined the need for the soldiers to always keep themselves highly alerted and step up combat preparations, aware at all times that they should be ready to fight against the enemies any time.
					
					 The service personnel are fully determined to return fire for fire and mercilessly annihilate the aggressors once they intrude into the territory of the DPRK even an inch, said Kim Jong Un, calling on them to deal merciless, just retaliatory blows at the enemies if they perpetrate a provocation.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Ri Yong Gil, Son Chol Ju, Ryom Chol Song, Yun Tong Hyon, Pang Kwan Bok, Yun Tong Hui, Hwang Pyong So and Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Cultural and Sports Apparatuses, Vehicles to Sports Units
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Cultural and Sports Apparatuses, Vehicles to Sports Units
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un sent cultural and sports apparatuses and vehicles to different units in the sports field.
					 He sent apparatuses for matches and trainings of basketball players of sports teams across the country and vehicles needed for the management and operation of the Rungna People's Sports Park Management Station on Feb. 19 in the wake of sending lots of cultural apparatuses to sportspersons on Feb 4.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of Armenia
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Armenia
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Serge Sarkissian on his reelection as president of the Republic of Armenia.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Armenia would grow strong in line with the desires of the peoples of the two countries and wished the Armenian president greater success in his work for the prosperity of the country and the wellbeing of its people.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction of Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of KPA
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction of Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of KPA
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim made a field survey of the site of the large Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of the Korean People's Army now under construction to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Looking round the site, he recalled that the heroic feats of the fighters of the KPA who fought against the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the strongest in the world by displaying matchless courage and self-sacrificing spirit during the war and thus humbled their arrogance and honorably defended the country under the wise leadership of great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung have shined through generations under the care of the party.
					
					 Calling for thoroughly implementing the important tasks set forth in the decision of a meeting of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, he discussed issues arising in the construction and took relevant steps.
					
					 Earlier, he learnt about the updating of the Turf Institute of the State Academy of Sciences and management and operation of equipment at the Pyongyang Textile Machine Plant. He underscored the need to ensure the high quality in the construction and take good care of the equipment.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Delegation of General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un Wednesday received a letter from the members of the delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China presented to him before their departure from the homeland after taking part in the celebrations of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter said that the homeland is the mother's embrace and that of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il which they longed for awake or asleep and even in their dreams.
					
					 As there was Kim Jong Il, Koreans in China could live as dignified members of the sun's nation, stretching out their chests without feeling any fear and loneliness even though they were in an alien land, the letter noted, adding:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, identical to Kim Jong Il, is standing in the van of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He put the dignity and capability of the nation on the highest level by wisely leading the army and people of the DPRK with his distinguished leadership ability and noble virtue.
					
					 Juche satellite conquered the space yesterday and an underground nuclear test was successfully conducted today, fully demonstrating the national power of the homeland. This eye-opening event instills pride and self-respect of being members of the Korean nation into all overseas compatriots.
					
					 The letter confirmed the pledge to rally more and more compatriots around the general association to consolidate it and make uninterrupted struggle to meet all challenges of the hostile forces keen to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 All Koreans in China will stage the vigorous patriotic movement and make sincere efforts for the prosperity of the homeland, it stressed.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, Ugandan president, on Feb. 12.
					 The president in his message sent his best wishes to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the government of the DPRK and its people on behalf of the Ugandan government and people on the occasion of the 71st birthday (Feb. 16, 2013) of HE Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 He noted that the great leader devotedly served his people all his life, turning his country into a single-mindedly united great country and achieving socio-economic development.
					
					 Highly praising the life and the great feats of Kim Jong Il, the president hoped that the good bilateral relations with Kim Jong Un, and the government and people of the DPRK would steadily develop.
					
					 He sent highest regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Statement of Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
articles.content:
Statement of Spokesman for DPRK Foreign Ministry Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry released a statement on Feb. 12 as regards the third underground nuclear test conducted by it as its self-defensive measure for self-defence to cope with the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					 The statement was distributed as an official document of the UN Security Council S/2013/91 on Feb. 19.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Leaves for Russia
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, left here for Russia on Thursday to attend the 15th Congress of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.

articles.title: Banquet Given in Honor of Contributors to Third Underground Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Banquet Given in Honor of Contributors to Third Underground Nuclear Test
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) gave a banquet at the Mokran House on Thursday in honor of scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials who made contributions to the successful third underground nuclear test.
					 Senior officials of the party and state including Kim Yong Nam and Choe Yong Rim were present there. 
					
					 Invited at the banquet were scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials who contributed to the successful 3rd underground nuclear test.
					
					 Senior officials of the party and state warmly welcomed them.
					
					 Before the banquet they enjoyed a performance presented by Wangjaesan Art Troup in congratulation of success in the underground nuclear test.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, made an address at the banquet.
					
					 He warmly congratulated them on successfully conducting the third underground nuclear test and thereby fully demonstrating the self-defense capability of Songun Korea upon the authorization of Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 This great victory of Songun is the shining fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un who has glorified the immortal feats great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by providing national power strong enough to reliably defend the nation's dignity and sovereignty and firmly defended the country bequeathed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The speaker noted that by achieving great success in the recent nuclear test the nuclear weapon makers rendered distinguished services for confidently putting the DPRK, political and ideological power which boasts of single-minded unity and a tremendous military power, on the status of a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and ensuring peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the region.
					
					 He highly praised them as the best comrades-in-arms of Kim Jong Un and his best comrades and first-line fighters for defending the country as they glorified the immortal feats of the WPK, which bolstered up the country's self-defence capability in every way under the banner of Songun and exercised the sovereignty of the DPRK through practical actions, not in words.
					
					 He called upon them to conduct the drive for dynamically pushing back the frontiers of latest science and technology with the firm pluck and spirit with which they would surpass the world standard in the field of nuclear technology and thus steadily reinforce the Korean-style powerful nuclear strike capacity which no enemies can predict and resolutely shatter the moves of the U.S. and all hues of hostile forces.

articles.title: Special Thanks Sent to Those Who Successfully Conducted Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Special Thanks Sent to Those Who Successfully Conducted Nuclear Test 
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK sent a message of special thanks to scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of national defence science and solider-builders who successfully carried out the third underground nuclear test.
					 The message said that the recent nuclear test fully demonstrated the excellent performance of the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK that has been diversified, and the technology of manufacturing nuclear weapons of Songun Korea that has reached a cutting-edge level.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The underground nuclear test conducted by the DPRK in the wake of its successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 represented a great political and military victory as it made the international community confidently recognize the status of the DPRK as a strategic rocket and nuclear weapons state and brought about a fundamental change in the world political structure and the balance of forces.
					
					 People in the field of national defence science carried out the test, exercise of the independent right of the country, thus dealing sledge-hammer blows at the U.S. imperialists, Japanese reactionaries and the south Korean puppet forces who are working with bloodshot eyes to force the DPRK to "disarm itself" and to "overturn its social system", the message added.
					
					 It highly appreciated the scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of national defence science and soldier-builders who have made great contributions to winning a great victory in the all-out confrontation with the U.S. imperialists and its allies, and safeguarding the supreme interests of the DPRK.
					
					 It is firm determination and will of the dear respected Kim Jong Un to finally conclude the confrontation with the U.S. imperialists by dint of arms of Songun and build the strongest power which the whole world looks up and a people's paradise on this land, the message stressed.
					
					 It expressed the conviction that the scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of national defence science and soldier-builders would win one victory after another, closely united around Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Meritorious Persons for Successful Nuclear Test Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Meritorious Persons for Successful Nuclear Test Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun 
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials who took part in the successful third underground nuclear test visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay high respects to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Thursday. 
					 They entered the hall where statues of the Generalissimos stand to pay tribute. 
					
					 Then they entered the halls of immortality where the Generalissimos lie in state and made deep bows.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the Generalissimos received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tour till the last period of their lives.

articles.title: Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test Visit Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Contributors to Successful Nuclear Test Visit Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery 
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials who contributed to the successful third underground nuclear test visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong here on Thursday. 
					 They laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk before paying tribute to her. 
					
					 They also laid a wreath and bouquets on the wreath-laying stand of the cemetery and paid silent tribute to anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs.

articles.title: More Army-people Rallies Hail Third Underground Nuclear Test
articles.content:
More Army-people Rallies Hail Third Underground Nuclear Test
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies took place in North Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces and Rason City on Thursday to hail the third underground nuclear test.
					 Present at the rallies were leading officials of the party and power organs and working people's organizations, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and other people of factories, enterprises and co-operative farms, and teachers and students of universities and colleges. 
					
					 Speakers said at the rallies that the DPRK's third underground nuclear test is a just step for self-defence taken by the service personnel and people of the DPRK who decisively crushed the U.S. moves to stifle it, and a significant event that demonstrated to the world once again that the DPRK does what it is determined to do.
					
					 They said that they would complete the KPA preparations for the battle and strengthen the great army-people unity to mercilessly frustrate the provocations of the enemy, adding that it is their mode of counteraction and disposition to fight it out against the hostile forces with arms.
					
					 They noted: We cannot concede to the U.S. hostile policy and its war maneuvers even a bit but must deal an immediate and merciless counter strike. It is the final conclusion the service personnel and people of the DPRK have drawn in the decades-long confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 They said they would bring about a radical turn in the building of an economic giant by waging a dynamic socialist emulation drive and the charge for increased production with the same spirit and mettle as were displayed in conquering space.

articles.title: Palestinian Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Palestinian Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan Thursday gave a reception at his embassy in celebration of leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary.
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health, Song Ja Rip, president of Kim Il Sung University who is concurrently minister of Higher Education, and officials concerned.
					
					 The ambassador in his address said all the successes achieved in the DPRK are the precious fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, who successfully guided the effort for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would register fresh leap forward and innovation in every field of socialist construction under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who is brilliantly carrying forward to completion the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The friendly relations between the DPRK and Palestine which were provided by Yasser Arafat and Kim Il Sung and consolidated by Mahmoud Abbas and Kim Jong Il are growing strong under the deep care of Kim Jong Un, he added.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok said it is an expression of deep reverence for Kim Jong Il that the friends of Palestine significantly celebrated his birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star) with the Korean people.
					
					 The cause of the Korean people for building a thriving nation will certainly be accomplished thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il, he said.
					
					 The Korean people will unvaryingly support the just cause of the Palestinian people, he concluded.

articles.title: 17th Kimjongilia Festival Closes
articles.content:
17th Kimjongilia Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The 17th Kimjongilia Festival closed with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Thursday. It opened on Feb. 14 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 More than 400 000 people visited the venue of the festival. Among them were senior officials of the party, state and army, officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children. 
					
					 It was also visited by the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, delegations of overseas Koreans, diplomatic envoys of foreign countries, representatives of international organizations, members of the military attaches corps and the economic and commercial councilors corps here, and many overseas compatriots and foreign guests. 
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned, officials of ministries and national institutions, service personnel, people of different social standings, school youth and children. 
					
					 It was also attended by the delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, foreigners and Chinese residents here. 
					
					 Diplomas of the top prize were awarded to the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ponghwa Guidance Bureau and others and diplomas of special prize went to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea. 
					
					 Diplomas of the best prize, prize for excellence, festival organization prize and festival art prize were awarded to many units. 
					
					 Those who raised Kimjongilia at a high scientific and technological level received diplomas of prize of cultivating technology, dozens of service personnel, people, school youth and children, overseas Koreans, foreigners, Chinese residents in the DPRK received diplomas of prize of merits and prize of display and certificates of the participants in the festival. 
					
					 Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, in his closing address called upon service personnel, people, officials and scientists in the field of horticulture, flower lovers and members of the societies for disseminating and supporting Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia in different countries to boost exchange and cooperation in flower cultivation and dissemination in the future, too, to make the flowers of the sun bloom more beautifully.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestlers Prove Successful in Bulgaria
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestlers Prove Successful in Bulgaria
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK wrestlers proved successful at an international wrestling tournament held in Bulgaria.
					 The tournament brought together 200 wrestlers from at least 20 countries, including the DPRK, and regions.
					
					 Yang Kyong Il, player of the DPRK, took the title of men's 55 kg freestyle wrestling.
					
					 Hwang Ryong Hak placed second in men's 60 kg freestyle wrestling matches while Yun Won Chol third in men's 55 kg Greco-Roman matches.
					
					 The players came back home Thursday.

articles.title: Papers Praise Those Who Succeeded in Third Underground Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Papers Praise Those Who Succeeded in Third Underground Nuclear Test
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Papers Thursday carry an editorial in praise of the scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials who made contributions to successfully carrying out the third underground nuclear test. 
					 They are proud heroes of the nation who strikingly demonstrated the indomitable faith and pluck of Songun Korea advancing under the uplifted banner of independence, Rodong Sinmun says.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The third underground nuclear test is a practical countermeasure to defend the security and sovereignty of the DPRK and a historic event that demonstrated the overall defence capabilities of Songun Korea.
					
					 The DPRK's successful nuclear test on a high level dealt a merciless blow to those who are making desperate efforts to stifle it, demonstrated the dignity of the sun's nation to the world and thus provided a firm guarantee for the prosperity of the great Paektusan nation. 
					
					 The great Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea powerfully showed that it will never abandon the dignity of its sovereign state but resolutely smash any action that is aimed to force it to disarm itself and do harm to its social system. The test, a heroic event, becomes an immortal feat to shine long in the history of the country. 
					
					 They who succeeded in the third underground nuclear test are precious talents and valuable assets who highly displayed the might of the rapidly developing science and technology and the defence capabilities of the country.
					
					 They are genuine patriots who contributed to strengthening the military guarantee for building an economic power.
					
					 They are also revolutionary soldiers loyal to the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and pride of Songun Korea whom the whole country should respect.
					
					 Minju Joson says that their heroic feats in helping the country win a great victory in the nation's history will be glorified forever along with the history of the Songun revolution of the WPK.

articles.title: Struggle of DPRK for Defending Sovereignty Can Never Be Arrested: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Struggle of DPRK for Defending Sovereignty Can Never Be Arrested: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- After the success in the third underground nuclear test the DPRK's army and people are feeling national pride and self-esteem and are hardening pledge to win a final victory by crushing any war maneuvers of hostile forces, says Rodong Sinmun on Thursday in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK is a responsible peace-loving country which is faithful to not only national duty but also international duty.
					
					 Now the patience and willpower of the DPRK's army and people have reached the limit line.
					
					 The U.S. had better apologize though belatedly for fabricating the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" in violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK, recognize its right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes and rectify the policy of a preemptive nuclear attack on it and hostile policy to it. The U.S. has no other way. However, it is making misguided calculation. It is scheming to internationalize and incriminate the nuclear "issue" of the DPRK and realize its hegemonic ambition.
					
					 By finding fault with the strong army and people of the DPRK, the U.S. seeks to realize its ambition of dominating the Asian-Pacific region while Japan to open the way for overseas expansion. Herein lie danger and gravity of the anti-DPRK maneuvers of the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					 But practically this dangerous issue is being covered by words "threat from north Korea" advertised by the U.S. and other hostile forces. This mask must be uncovered.
					
					 If the U.S. moves to make the DPRK fall victim to its foreign policy of aggression and domination, not rolling back its hostile policy to the DPRK, the latter will take tougher countermeasures.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to clearly know that the war with the DPRK will never be a game.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces S. Korean "Defense Minister" for Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces S. Korean "Defense Minister" for Reckless Remarks 
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Kwan Jin, "minister of Defense" of south Korea, was recently reported to have cried out for "getting ready to beat the north at the initial stage of war and cut off its windpipe through missile strikes when the north provokes." He let out these outbursts while examining "military targets of the north" for a missile unit of the south Korean puppet army and its operational plan. 
					 Minju Joson Thursday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin is getting frantic with the moves to ignite a war against the north, letting loose a spate of reckless remarks. This is an intolerable act of treachery to plunge all Koreans into disasters.  
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime is not in a position to fight a war against the DPRK as it is controlled by the U.S., which dares not provoke the DPRK. For the south Korean warmongers to try to beat the north reminds one of a puppy knowing no fear of the tiger.
					
					 Bellicose remarks made by Kim, unable to face up to the trend of the times, are aimed to rev up the sagging morale of the soldiers of south Korea and ignite a war against the north at any cost. 
					
					  The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea had better cool their heads heated with war hysteria and behave themselves, the commentary warns. 
					
					 If they ignite a war against the DPRK despite its warnings, its army and people will deal merciless blows at them and win a victory in the great war for national reunification, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: Nuclear Test, Part of DPRK's Substantial Countermeasures to Defend Its Sovereignty: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Nuclear Test, Part of DPRK's Substantial Countermeasures to Defend Its Sovereignty: KCNA Commentary
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's third nuclear test was part of its substantial countermeasures for defending its security and sovereignty to cope with the vicious hostile actions of the U.S.
					 It was a full-fledged exercise of the country's sovereignty as the test demonstrated the will and potentials of Songun Korea to stand against the brigandish action of the U.S., which wantonly encroached upon even the right of a sovereign state to launch satellite for peaceful purposes.
					
					 The U.S., however, portraying it as a "challenge" to the international community, has stepped up hostile actions while crying out for a "preemptive nuclear attack" on the DPRK. This can neither frighten the DPRK nor make it retract its countermeasures as it has already predicted how things will turn and experienced such actions.
					
					 The U.S. stepped-up hostile actions prove that the DPRK's option and reaction were quite just, and only harden the will to counter tough action with toughest action.
					
					 This is the truth proved by the history of the DPRK-U.S. relations and confrontation.
					
					 As known, no nation has directly been exposed to the U.S. nuclear threat for such a long time in the world as the Korean nation.
					
					 The nuclear threat to the Korean nation is an issue which should be settled by staking its destiny as the country was directly affected by the U.S. nuclear attacks on Hiroshima and Nagasaki in 1945 and took heavy toll next to Japan.
					
					 Proceeding from this, the DPRK proposed establishing a peace zone free from A-bombs in Asia in 1959 after the war and has made every possible effort for decades to realize the proposal.
					
					 To this end, it has worked hard for dialogue including bilateral and multilateral talks with the U.S. and countries concerned and made positive efforts by dint of international law including its accession to NPT.
					
					 But the U.S. hostile policy and strategy for nuclear blackmail aimed to swallow up the whole of Korea at any cost, prompted by the advantageous topographical features of the Korean Peninsula, have been systematically intensified in all fields century after century.
					
					 This proved that the efforts through dialogue and by dint of international law will all end up in smoke as long as the U.S. hostile policy and threat of a nuclear war continue.
					
					 The DPRK has been put in the "list of preemptive nuclear attack" amid the state of physical showdown with the U.S., the biggest nuclear weapons state and the only nuclear war criminal state, which has long persisted. Defending the sovereignty of the country under such situation was not an issue which could be settled with words or appeals.
					
					 The ceaseless nuclear blackmail and sanctions racket kicked up by the U.S. gravely threatening the DPRK's right to self-determination and development and even its vital right required a special solution to them.
					
					 Therefore, what the DPRK finally opted was the strategic resolution to react to nuclear weapons with nuclear weapons.
					
					 The tragic consequences in those countries which abandoned halfway their nuclear programs, yielding to the high-handed practices and pressure of the U.S. in recent years, clearly prove that the DPRK was very far-sighted and just when it made the option.   They also teach the truth that the U.S. nuclear blackmail should be countered with substantial countermeasures, not with compromise or retreat.
					
					 The resolute stand of the DPRK that it will take tougher countermeasures in succession if the U.S. goes hostile to it is based on the present-day's stark situation and the historical lesson.
					
					 The DPRK's substantial countermeasures based on justice and truth will continue till it wins a final victory.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Japan's Open Agitation of Action to Grab Tok Islets
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Japan's Open Agitation of Action to Grab Tok Islets
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Japan's moves to grab Tok Islets have reached a more reckless phase. 
					 Japan decided to let a vice-minister level official of the government  take part in the observation of "Day of Takeshima" which has been held so far within Shimane Prefecture. 
					
					 The Japanese government was directly involved in the action to elevate the level of the event, not content with observing the ridiculous "Day of Takeshima" as an annual one. This indicates that the moves for territorial expansion are being pushed forward in an organized and systematic manner by the state as they are undisguised agitation of aggression by the Japanese authorities. 
					
					 Japan has escalated its moves to grab Tok Islets, part of the inalienable territory of Korea, in a more cunning and despicable manner year by year.
					
					 In a bid to make its claim to Tok Islets a fait accompli Japan brought up the issue of Tok Islets for discussion on 126 occasions before and after its ratification of the convention of the UN Law on Sea in 1996 and the conclusion of the Japan-south Korea "fishery agreement" in 1998.
					
					 Japan's scenario to grab Tok Islets was put into practice with increased zeal in the new century.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries prodded the Shimane Prefectural Assembly into instituting and proclaiming the "Day of Takeshima" and observing it as an annual event. 
					
					 Japan made public a decision to use textbooks in which Tok Islets are mentioned as part of its "territory" at all elementary schools last year for the purpose of convincing the young Japanese of its claim to the islets.
					
					 Recently the Tokyo Metropolitan Education Committee made it clear that it would sharply increase the description about Tok Islets in the history textbook for Metropolis-run high schools from this spring. The textbook contained such new additions concerning Tok Islets, an indication of Japan's territorial ambition, as "in the middle of the 17th century Japan established dominium on Tok Islets and its intention of such dominium was reconfirmed by the decision of the Cabinet meeting in 1905."
					
					 The only reason for Japan to claim dominium on Tok Islets is that in 1905 when the Japanese imperialists illegally occupied Korea, Shimane Prefecture issued what it called an official gazette on bringing Tok Islets under its jurisdiction.
					
					 As the Japanese imperialists' aggression of Korea itself was an illegal and high-handed one, Shimane Prefecture's farce of bringing Tok Islets under its jurisdiction was a grave infringement upon the territorial sovereignty of the Korean nation.
					
					 The disposition of the Samurais desperately making their eyes at others' territories will never change.
					
					 Japan should draw a proper lesson from the shameful defeat the Japanese imperialists sustained while going wild to realize territorial aggrandizement.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Protests U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Protests U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held the 161st action for independent reunification and peace in front of the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Feb. 19 at which it censured the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 The north conducted the third underground nuclear test to cope with the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against it over its successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, the organization said.
					
					 The U.S., however, is pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to a serous crisis by kicking up the "sanctions" racket against the north again, it charged.
					
					 The U.S., Japan, south Korean authorities and conservative media are vociferating about the north's provocation and its abrogation of the agreement but the U.S. is the real provocateur and its violator, it held.
					
					 Pressure and confrontation will only lead to a war, it said, urging the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Supreme Court Sentences Teachers to Prison Term
articles.content:
S. Korean Supreme Court Sentences Teachers to Prison Term
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Supreme Court sentenced teachers of the Pusan branch of the Teachers  Trade Union to eight months in prison and two years' stay of execution, upholding the original verdict, on charges of violation of the "Security Law", according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The court took this action for the mere reason that they produced reference books and distributed them and gave lectures on the basis of them, while operating a reunification school for teachers of the branch in 2005.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime kicked off a repressive campaign against the progressive teachers, insisting that those books on reunification education which are no more than extracts from legal publications are "enemy-benefiting literature" praising and justifying the ideology and social system in the north. This is touching off bitter resentment among all compatriots.

articles.title: Sit-in Strike Staged in Demand of End to Unpopular Rule in S. Korea
articles.content:
Sit-in Strike Staged in Demand of End to Unpopular Rule in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Situation Council for Urgently Coping with Lay-off, Part-time Job and Destruction of Trade Unions in south Korea staged a sit-in strike in Seoul on Feb. 18 in protest against the puppet regime's unpopular rule.
					 Prior to the strike it held a press conference.
					
					 At the press conference speakers accused the "government" authorities of dismissing and suppressing leading members of trade unions, instead of settling the situation at Hanjin Heavy Industry, Ssangyong Motors, Yusong Enterprise and Hyundai Motors.
					
					 They expressed irrepressible resentment at the authorities who are shunning the settlement of the labor issue demanded by the overwhelming majority of the people, conniving at the entrepreneurs' destruction of trade unions.
					
					 They declared they would struggle to bring about society for the workers at the risk of their lives.
					
					 They threatened to stage high-profile actions such as meeting, demonstration and information service in various places of Seoul during the strike.
					
					 That day a candlelight rally took place with workers and other people of different social standings involved.
					
					 In the meantime, the Solidarity Council for Part-time Jobs at Schools in the area of Seoul staged a sit-in strike outside the Seoul Municipal Education Agency in protest against group dismissal.
					
					 The organization charged that at least 1 200 part-time members of the council in Seoul are in danger of being discharged with the new school term at hand.

articles.title: Japan's Invariable Ambition for Reinvasion Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Invariable Ambition for Reinvasion Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Japan's moves to deny the past crimes have reached the height under the Abe government.
					 Prime Minister Abe at the budgetary committee of the House of Representatives on February 7, touching on the crime related to the sexual slavery, said that there is no evidence proving that the imperial Japanese army stormed dwelling houses and forcibly took away women to make them comfort women.
					
					 Reporting on this, Asahi Shimbun commented that this is the denial of the evidence concerning the army's direct involvement in the forcible recruitment of comfort women which was admitted in 1993 "Kono statement".
					
					 In the past Japanese aggression troops carried off a great number of women to battlefields and treated them as sexual playthings. Now their descendents are working desperately to cover up the unprecedented sexual slavery.
					
					 Abe was born with the disposition of a philistine peculiar to island country Japan which does not make any scruple of profoundly confusing the right and the wrong to meet its own interests. Abe said that he regards it as extremely regretful that he failed to pay visits to Yasukuni Shrine during the first Abe cabinet period, stunning the world people.
					
					 Question is what Japan aims in categorically denying the past crimes.
					
					 Analysts seriously view the Japanese reactionaries' moves of whetting sharp the sword of reinvasion, an indication that they still harbor the ambition for becoming a military giant.
					
					 The Japanese authorities have already decided to reexamine "defense program guidelines" which were adopted under the Democratic Party government in the wake of Abe's revelation of his intention to expand and reinforce troops and arms and equipment of "Self-Defense Forces".
					
					 At a full-dress session of the House of Councilors, Abe openly disclosed his idea to revise the constitution in order to retool the "Self-Defense Forces" as the "national defense forces". He even instructed reexamining detailed kinds that would allow the exercise of the right to collective self-defense.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' persistent and brazen-faced moves of negating the past crimes are prompted by their sordid plan to realize the old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" and become the "leader of Asia."
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should make sincere repentance of their dirty past crimes, clearly understanding that their moves to become military power and launch reinvasion will only invite another defeat.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Test Hailed by Vice-Chairman of General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Test Hailed by Vice-Chairman of General Association of Koreans in China
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, released a statement on Feb. 15 to congratulate the DPRK on its third underground nuclear test.
					 The DPRK's recent successful nuclear test fully demonstrated its invincible capability to defend justice and truth and reliably guarantee the peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the region and greatly encouraged progressive mankind, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could threaten the world with huge nuclear weapons and neither "sanctions" nor blockade can work on Songun Korea.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea should stop acting rashly, toeing the U.S. line.
					
					 All the Koreans in China will join the people in the homeland in turning out as one in the struggle to resolutely shatter the moves of the U.S. and all other hostile forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK and moves for igniting a new war.
					
					 Songun Korea is sure to always emerge victorious in the all-out action against imperialism and the U.S. as long as it is led by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu, and there are the invincible single-minded unity of all service personnel and people and tremendous national power.

articles.title: Japan's "Sanctions" against Chongryon Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's "Sanctions" against Chongryon Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan issued a statement on Feb. 20 denouncing the Japanese authorities for their vicious "sanctions" against the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Korean youth and students in Japan strongly protested against the Japanese government's unreasonable additional "sanctions" against Chongryon, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Japanese Prime Minister Abe called for the additional "sanctions" and in a "statement" took a step to prohibit the reentry to Japan of the vice-chairmen of Chongryon from the DPRK to which they made visits.
					
					 Their crackdown upon Chongryon organizations and Koreans in Japan being committed as part of "sanctions" is, indeed, ruthless and uncouth.
					
					  Due to the step of embargo on ship Mangyongbong-92, it has become hard for the aged, invalid and disabled Koreans in Japan to visit the homeland. Students of Korean schools suffer the increase in financial burden as they have to conduct study tour of the homeland by air. We, youth and students, cannot repress the mounting anger over the artificial restrictions that have become increasingly tougher. 
					
					 The Japanese authorities restrict vice-chairmen of Chongryon from conducting free activities, while groundlessly charging that they are "of the stand of rendering substantial help to the authorities of north Korea as their staff members". This is the revelation of the dirty political ambition of the Japanese authorities to stifle Chongryon. 
					
					 We can never allow their step on "sanctions" as it is brutal and inhuman one to threaten and blackmail the DPRK by treating Koreans in Japan as hostages, pursuant to the policy of discriminating against Koreans. 
					
					 We will pool the efforts with conscientious Japanese youth and students to turn out in the effort for improving the relations between the DPRK and Japan. 
					
					 All the Korean youth and students in Japan strongly demand the Japanese government give up the policy of discriminating against the Korean nation and lift the "sanctions" at once.

articles.title: Short Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Short Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced by Russian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The short biography of leader Kim Jong Il was introduced by the Russian paper Argumenti I Pakti on Feb. 16.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Nigeria's Internet Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Nigeria's Internet Website
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The full text of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Enhance the Militant Might of the Party in Every Way and Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Improving the Work of Party Cells" was posted on the website of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Feb. 13.
					 The work, made public on Jan. 29, Juche 102 (2013), clarifies the tasks for preserving the revolutionary character of the Workers' Party of Korea as a glorious party of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, enhancing the party cells' militant might in every way by improving their work as required by the development of the times and revolution, and stepping up the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Test Hailed by British Political Party
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Test Hailed by British Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain issued a statement on Feb. 14 congratulating the DPRK on its successful 3rd underground nuclear test.
					 The statement said that the DPRK carried out the nuclear test without giving any negative effect to the surrounding ecological environment.
					
					 The test was part of practical countermeasures taken by the DPRK to defend the security and sovereignty of the country and develop the self-defensive nuclear deterrence to cope with the hostile actions of the U.S. and its allies which wantonly violated a sovereign state's legitimate right to develop the space for peaceful purposes, and its allies, the statement added.
					
					 It noted that the party and all revolutionaries of the world warmly congratulated the DPRK on achieving successes one after another in the field of science and technology, and are sincerely rejoiced over those successes.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies are not entitled to take issue with the nuclear test of the DPRK for self-defence as the U.S. plunged mankind into a nuclear holocaust for the first time in the world, conducted more nuclear tests than others and has possessed nukes enough to kill mankind scores of times, the statement added.
					
					 The DPRK has access to the nuclear deterrent for self-defence to safeguard the sovereignty and security of the country and its people as it has constantly been exposed to threat from the U.S., it said.
					
					 It extended support and solidarity to the self-defensive measure of the DPRK, bitterly condemning the U.S. and its allies for their anti-DPRK moves.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Foreign Countries
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's feats took place in Russia, Mexico and Switzerland between Feb. 9 and 12.
					 The chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia said in her report that Kim Jong Il enjoyed absolute support and trust from the people during the whole period of his revolutionary leadership.
					
					 His outstanding ideological and theoretical activities provided a guarantee for the development of the invincible socialist state, the DPRK, she said.
					
					 She added the validity and vitality of the Songun politics pursued by him are being displayed with added clarity day by day.
					
					 The chairman of the Nakhodka Regional Committee of the "A Just Russia" said thanks to Kim Jong Il's devoted efforts the DPRK could become a state capable of manufacturing and launching satellite as well as a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The chairperson of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il who made great contributions to the prosperity of the country and the cause of global independence with his extraordinary ideological and theoretical activities and energetic Songun revolutionary leadership as a prominent statesman, a peerless brilliant Songun commander and a world veteran politician.
					
					 The chairperson of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers said Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il took the noble motto of believing in the people as in heaven as the starting point and fundamental idea of the state building and activity, adding they led the DPRK to victory and glory with the policy of love for and belief in the people all their life.
					
					 A congratulatory message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Russia.

articles.title: National Seminar Held in Nigeria
articles.content:
National Seminar Held in Nigeria 
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian national seminar to celebrate the birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il took place at Nasarawa Provincial University on Feb. 12.
					 Displayed in the venue were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un on their revolutionary activities.
					
					 Also on display were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the service personnel and people of the DPRK in their drive to build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, in a report said that the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was formulated as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, adding:
					
					 This is an event of great historic significance to all the people struggling for independence and socialism as well as the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 Kim Jong Il conducted energetic ideological and theoretical activities to comprehensively systematize the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and glorify it as the great guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 He, who steadily developed the Songun idea of Kim Il Sung, laid out the line of building a thriving socialist nation and wisely led the efforts to carry it out.
					
					 It is natural that the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was formulated as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Speeches were made by Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the acting chairman of the Group for Self-Reliance Studies, Ahmed Blaza Lawan, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Songun Politics, and other personages.
					
					 The speakers highly praised the immortal Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and the great personality of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is wisely guiding the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Celebrated in Guinea
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Celebrated in Guinea
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place in Guinea from Feb. 7 to 13 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. They included a seminar on his exploits, lecture, visit to the Kimilsungia Greenhouse, photo exhibition and film show.
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos documenting Kim Jong Il's undying exploits.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos featuring the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving nation.
					
					 Participants in the film show watched the Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation."
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Jong Il wisely led the party, army and people of the DPRK for a long period, performing immortal feats before the times and history.
					
					 His whole life was the most brilliant one of a great revolutionary and peerless patriot who dedicated his all to the country and people, the chairman stressed.
					
					 Camano Vitor, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, noted that remarkable successes achieved by the DPRK in recent years are a precious fruition of the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, who led the army and people of the country to victory.
					
					 Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, said that Kim Jong Il shaped a unique music policy in the course of leading the party, state and army of the DPRK.
					
					 His work "Theory of Musical Art", which is seen as a library of music and art theory in the new era, and the DPRK's rapidly developing musical art are a product of his rare musical talents and attainments, the chairman noted.
					
					 Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, reflecting the unanimous desire of the Guinean people, paid the highest tribute to Kim Jong Il, who exalted the DPRK by dint of Songun by carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Meetings to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Romania, Poland, Sweden and Uzbekistan from Feb. 7 to 13.
					 Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, praised Kim Jong Il as a great leader who made tremendous contributions to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The DPRK legitimately ranked itself among nuclear weapons states and space powers thanks to the firm faith and will of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme leader, who is reliably carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the preceding leaders, the chairman noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Poland-DPRK Association said that it is an expression of absolute trust of the Korean people in Kim Jong Il that they thank him for all the achievements made in the country.
					
					 The chairman of the Uzbekistan-DPRK Friendship Forum noted that Kim Jong Il's feats remain in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in the third underground nuclear test in the wake of the launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, fully demonstrating the country's scientific and technological development and its powerful self-reliant capabilities, the chairman stressed.

articles.title: British Organizations Praise Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
British Organizations Praise Kim Jong Il's Exploits
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Feb. 6 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 To significantly celebrate Feb. 16, his birth anniversary, is a manifestation of support and solidarity with Juche Korea, which is staging all-out actions against the U.S. imperialists, the statement said.
					
					 It referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il, born as the son of guerrillas in the crucible of the anti-Japanese war, cultivated patriotism to dedicate everything to the prosperity of the country in the days of the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 He started the Songun revolutionary leadership with his inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army, developed the Workers' Party of Korea into a revolutionary party of Juche type and comprehensively systematized and developed the Juche idea.
					
					 He achieved a victory in a war against the U.S. imperialists without gunfire with his unique Songun politics and turned the DPRK into a socialist power that accessed nuclear deterrence.
					
					 He protected the sovereignty of the country by dint of Songun and wisely led the Korean people's struggle to build a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Concert for Reunification Given in U.S.
articles.content:
Concert for Reunification Given in U.S.
						
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A concert for reunification in spring of February was given in Manhattan, New York to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the audience were Koreans in the U.S. and Canada, staff members of the permanent mission of the DPRK at the United Nations and foreign diplomats.
					
					 Put on the stage were symphony "Please Receive Our Salute" and orchestral music "Footstep", symphony "The Sea of Blood," cello solo "Flocks of Wild Geese Fly", orchestral music "The Girl on the Swing" and world famous songs and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats of Kim Jong Il by glorifying socialist Korea with his invincible Songun politics and making great contributions to accomplishing the human cause of independence, and the spirit of the Korean people dynamically advancing under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona la unidad 323 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona la unidad 323 del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Mariscal Kim Jong Un, inspecciono la Unidad 323 del EPC que recibio el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					En el terreno el fue recibido por el general de ejercito, Ri Pyong Chol, comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, y otros comandantes de la unidad.
					
					El Comandante Supremo entrego como recuerdos los binoculos y fusil automatico a la compania adscrita directamente a la unidad y los binoculos, fusil automatico y ametralladora a la tercera compania del primer batallon de la misma unidad, y se fotografio con los oficiales de la comandancia y los militares de companias.
					
					Guiado por los comandantes, recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					Dijo que queria mucho ver a los militares amados tanto por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y pudo disponer el tiempo para visitarlos este dia. Estoy tan complacido por este encuentro que me siento librado de fatigas, expreso.
					
					Yo tambien concedo mayor importancia a esta unidad, al igual que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, senalo e instruyo a ella ultimar cuanto antes los preparativos de combate conociendo bien el proposito del Comandante Supremo para desempenar un papel importante en el enfrentamiento con los enemigos.
					
					En la Casa de los Militares y la biblioteca expreso satisfaccion de que se realizara de modo original la educacion politica e ideologica a los militares con suficientes datos y facilidades necesarios.
					
					Seguidamente, paso revista a la sala de procesamiento general.
					
					Se puso muy contento de que la unidad haya instalado varios equipos de procesamiento para el mejoramiento de los niveles de la vida alimentaria de los uniformados.
					
					En las salas de leccion militar y el gimnasio, averiguo la calidad de entrenamiento.
					
					El Mariscal visito el cuarto batallon de la unidad.
					
					Dejo a la quinta compania del batallon los binoculos y el fusil automatico como recuerdos y se retrato con los militares del batallon.
					
					Recorrio la sala de educacion, el cuartel y el bano de esa compania atendiendo las condiciones de vida de los uniformados.
					
					En la sala de leccion de la universidad politica O Jung Hup, se entero del estado de gestion y enseno el rumbo y remedios concretos.
					
					En el comedor vio el plan de operacion del "dia para los soldados" y se mostro muy alegre de que los oficiales y sus familiares atendieran con toda devocion la vida de los soldados.
					
					Viendo las materias de cocina expuestas sobre el trinchero, se informo en detalles del estado de suministro de alimentos subsidiarios y consumo.
					
					En el campo de entrenamiento general dirigio los ejercicios de los militares y examino los equipos tecnicos de combate de la unidad.
					
					En esta ocasion el fue acompanado por Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Yong Chun, Hwang Pyong So, Ra Chong Il, Hong Yong Chil y Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia equipos culturales y deportivos y medios de transporte a unidades de sector deportivo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia equipos culturales y deportivos y medios de transporte a unidades de sector deportivo
						
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio a varias unidades de sector deportivo los equipos culturales y deportivos y medios de transporte.
					El Mariscal envio el dia 4 a los deportistas muchos equipos culturales y el dia 19, mando los equipos para la competencia y el entrenamiento de los deportistas de baloncesto de los conjuntos deportivos de todo el pais y los medios de transporte necesarios a la gestion de la Empresa del Parque Deportivo del Pueblo de Rungna.

articles.title: Mensaje de agradecimiento especial a contribuyentes a prueba nuclear subterranea
articles.content:
Mensaje de agradecimiento especial a contribuyentes a prueba nuclear subterranea
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- La Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea enviaron el dia 17 un mensaje de agradecimiento especial a los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros, constructores militares y funcionarios de la rama de ciencia de defensa nacional, quienes realizaron con exito la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea.
					La misiva refiere que a traves de la presente prueba nuclear, se pusieron de pleno manifiesto el excelente funcionamiento del disuasivo nuclear diversificado y la tecnologia sofisticada de fabricacion de arma nuclear de Corea del Songun.
					
					Senala que el gran exito en la prueba nuclear constituye un regalo mas grande del PTC, el ejercito y el pueblo dirigido al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il, Sol del Songun, con motivo de su cumpleanos y el primer canonazo de la orgullosa victoria en la marcha general de este ano para coronar el 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC y el 60o de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria como gran festival de los triunfadores.
					
					Recuerda que con el trueno nuclear de caracter independiente, los soldados de la rama de ciencia de la defensa nacional dieron el golpe despiadado al imperialismo norteamericano,  los reaccionarios japoneses y los titeres surcoreanos que se enfrascan en las maniobras  para "desarmar" la RPDC y "derrocar" su regimen.
					
					Evalua altamente a ellos quienes contribuyeron a lograr gran victoria en la batalla de confrontacion total con el imperialismo norteamericano y sus fuerzas satelites y realizar grandes meritos en la defensa del supremo interes de la RPDC.
					
					Subraya que el PTC sigue confiando en los soldados de la industria de defensa nacional como patrulla y primeros vanguardista de la revolucion del Songun como lo hace en el EPC y desea que la rama de defensa nacional siga cumpliendo satisfactoriamente con el papal vanguardista en la construccion de un Estado prospero y la realizacion de la causa de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Expresa conviccion de que los contribuyente, unidos compactamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, defiendan firmemente la fabrica de armas nuclear de Corea del Songun y logren nuevas y sucesivas victorias en el desarrollo y la produccion de armas nucleares.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim dirige la construccion de tumbas de martires del EPC
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim dirige la construccion de tumbas de martires del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- El premier Choe Yong Rim dirigio sobre el terreno las tumbas de los martires del Ejercito Popular de Corea que se construyen majestuosamente con motivo del 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					El se refirio a que bajo la benevolencia del partido brillan en decadas y siglos los meritos heroicos de los combatientes del Ejercito Popular de Corea que en el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, conducida por el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, defendieron honrosamente la patria tras arrodillar al arrogante imperialismo norteamericano poniendo de pleno manifiesto la valentia y el espiritu de sacrificio.
					
					Insistio en la necesidad de materializar cabalmente las tareas combativas presentadas en la resolucion de la reunion del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, discutio los problemas que se presentan en la construccion y tomo las medidas correspondientes. 
					
					Con anterioridad, el premier averiguo el estado de reconstruccion del Instituto de Cesped de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias y la administracion de las instalaciones de la Fabrica de Maquinas Textiles de Pyongyang, ocasion en la cual apunto la necesidad de asegurar en el alto nivel la calidad de la construccion y cuidar bien las instalaciones.

articles.title: Distribuida nota de cancilleria de RPDC como documento oficial del Consejo de Seguridad
articles.content:
Distribuida nota de cancilleria de RPDC como documento oficial del Consejo de Seguridad
						
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedo distribuida el dia 19 como documento oficial S/2013/91 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU la declaracion del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, publicada el dia 12 con respecto a la tercera prueba nuclear realizada por ella como medida de autodefensa frente a las hostilidades de Estados Unidos.
